description: Creates a connection between two devices. The devices can be a physical or virtual appliance that connects to a third-party appliance in a VPC, or a physical appliance that connects to another physical appliance in an on-premises network.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the global network.

parameters.name: DeviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the first device in the connection.

parameters.name: ConnectedDeviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the second device in the connection.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A description of the connection. Length Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to apply to the resource during creation. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters. Value (string) --- The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the first device in the connection.

nested_items.name: ConnectedDeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the second device in the connection.

nested_items.name: LinkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the link for the first device in the connection.

nested_items.name: ConnectedLinkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the link for the second device in the connection.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the connection was created.
